sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.debug-panel
  h3 {{ title }}
  song-list
  h4 name: {{ currentSong.name }}
  h4 videoId: {{ currentSong.videoId }}
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { usePlaylistStore } from '../store/playlist'
import SongList from './SongList.vue'
export default {
  components: {
    SongList
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentSong']),

    title() {
      if (this.currentSong && Object.keys(this.currentSong).length) {
        return this.currentSong.name
      }
      return 'unravel / no title'
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.debug-panel {
  @include flex-center();
  @include flex-column();
  z-index: 1000;
  width: 300px;
  height: 500px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 100px;
  right: 35px;
  border: 1px red dotted;
  background-color: pink;
}
</style>
